references.paper_title: Image super-resolution using deep convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of deep convolutional networks for image super-resolution, establishing a benchmark for subsequent research in the field.
This foundational paper introduced the concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which have since become a prominent generative model in various image tasks including super-resolution.

references.paper_title: Ntire 2017 challenge on single image super-resolution: Methods and results
references.reason: This paper established a significant benchmark and evaluation framework for image super-resolution research, influencing many subsequent approaches.

references.paper_title: Photo-realistic single image super-resolution using a generative adversarial network
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of generative adversarial networks (GANs) for image super-resolution, greatly improving image quality and detail compared to previous methods.
This paper introduced the concept of binarized neural networks, a crucial technique for model compression and efficient inference, which is directly applied in this paper's proposed method.
